sentences.en: Acceptance by their peer group is important to most youngsters.
sentences.cn: 对大多数年轻人来说，为同辈所接纳是很重要的。

sentences.en: Acceptance of women preachers varies greatly from denomination to denomination.
sentences.cn: 在接受女性传教士的问题上，不同教派的态度大相径庭。

sentences.en: Car manufacturers are already producing small numbers of electric vehicles to test customer acceptance.
sentences.cn: 汽车制造商们已经开始生产少量的电动车辆以测试顾客的接受程度。

sentences.en: He veered between calm acceptance and hysterical accusations.
sentences.cn: 他时而泰然处之,时而歇斯底里地指责.

sentences.en: He wrote a letter of acceptance (=  a letter in which you agree to accept a job, university place etc  ) to the university.
sentences.cn: 他给那所大学写了一封接受函。

sentences.en: Her uncritical acceptance of everything I said began to irritate me.
sentences.cn: 我说什么她都不论对错一概接受，这倒惹我不耐烦起来。

sentences.en: It took years for Einstein's theory to gain acceptance.
sentences.cn: 爱因斯坦的理论经过多年才被人们接受.

sentences.en: Please confirm your acceptance of this offer in writing.
sentences.cn: 请书面确认你接受这项提议。
对爱因斯坦理论的认同

sentences.en: The acceptance of new members is strictly controlled.
sentences.cn: 新成员的吸纳受到严格的限制。

sentences.en: The new laws gained widespread acceptance.
The new merchant class was anxious for acceptance by the old nobility.
sentences.cn: 新兴的商业阶层渴望得到旧贵族的接纳.

sentences.en: The settlement of the issue must not be conditional upon the acceptance of fait accompli.
sentences.cn: 不能在造成既成事实的前提下解决这个问题.

sentences.en: There seems to be a grudging acceptance of the situation.
sentences.cn: 这一局面看来已经被勉强接受。

sentences.en: There was a general acceptance that the defence budget would shrink.
sentences.cn: 人们普遍相信国防预算将会缩减。

sentences.en: This reply is a virtual acceptance of our offer.
sentences.cn: 这一回答实质上是接受了我们的建议.

sentences.en: We have the pleasure to ask your acceptance of our presents.

words.tran_cn: 可接受的；合意的；可忍受的
公认的；录取的；可接受的；已承兑的
承兑的；易接受的；赞同的
[金融] 承兑人；接受者；接收器
接受（accept的过去式及过去分词）
接受；同意；承担（责任等）（accept的ing形式）
接受；承认；承担；承兑；容纳

phrases.tran_cn: n. 总统候选人所做的提名演讲
银行承兑汇票（等于bank acceptance）
附条件承诺；有条件承付汇票
验收；最终验收；最后验收
公众谅解，公众接受；令公众认受

trans.tran_cn: 接受，接纳，相信，承认，容忍，〈金融〉承兑
trans.tran_en: when people agree that an idea, statement, explanation etc is right or true
